actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the provision of automatic safety airbags in all automobiles beginning on or after September 1, 1986.

summary.text: Amends the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the installation of automatic safety airbags in passenger automobiles manufactured on or after September 1, 1986.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to require the provision of automatic safety airbags in all automobiles beginning on or after September 1, 1986.
